actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to designate the Logan Triangle in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as a brownfield site for purposes of the brownfields economic redevelopment initiative of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Logan Reclamation and Stabilization Act - Requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to designate the Logan Triangle in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as a brownfield site for purposes of the EPA's brownfields economic redevelopment initiative.

titles.title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to designate the Logan Triangle in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, as a brownfield site for purposes of the brownfields economic redevelopment initiative of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.
